message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you at $14,000. This is a great price, considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $11,000 is just too low for me. I'm willing to compromise a little, but I need to be closer to my initial offer. How about $13,000?  This is a fair price that still gives you a great deal on this valuable product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,500. Can you consider this price?
